author: Noemie Bisserbe
title: For New Trump Drug Plan, a Cautionary Tale in Italy
text:
ROME—The Trump administration is pushing drug plans that tie costs to performance as a way to lower health-care spending in the U.S. In Italy—where they’ve used the strategy for years—such plans haven’t brought down costs.
A number of global drug companies, in response to criticism of high prices in the U.S., have recently committed to tying the cost of some of their most-expensive treatments to how well they work.
So...
